title: Full image coverage for all Services items

requirements.summary: Add image paths for every service item so no ServiceCard renders without an image on the Services page.
acceptanceCriteria: In frontend/src/data/services.ts, every Service item in every category includes an image field pointing to a file under /assets/generated/ with .dim_800x600.jpg naming.
The Services page (frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx) renders an image for every ServiceCard; there are no service cards without an image on the page.

file_operations.description: Ensure every service item includes an `image` field (and update the Service type to require `image`), adding missing image paths for Hair Coloring, Hair Straightening, Royal Shave, Beard Coloring, Anti-Aging Facial, De-Tan Treatment, Executive Package, Luxury Package, and Groom Special. Keep all names/descriptions/categories/prices unchanged.
